> > If testing time is so high, then who wants to blame me for looking
> > for Parasoft JTest to make testing more productive?
> 
> Not I.  But to be clear: I *DON'T* think that spending large 
> portions of time testing is *BAD*.

Or, to be more clear, most people on this list probably experienced that
spending large portions of time testing is very productive. (That's
because TDD is *not* mainly about testing, but about design, so it seems
to me.)

Regards, Ilja
